beer.beer_description: Our beer brewed for Pride month here in the city! A portion of all pint, 4-pack, and case sales are being donated to various LGBTQ causes around the city. We did a HUGE batch of this, so it's our #1 priority on draft in Soho for the month of June to help get the word out. We're extremely happy to lean into Pride 2021, as it's a cause near and dear to our core values as a business and the city we love.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 235 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 48!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 170 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 35! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 7!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 400 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 81!

items.badge_description: Cheers for enjoying a brew with us! You have gained a new honorary title as The 3rd Monkey! Please come back soon to enjoy something new! We are always delighted to receive recommendations from your localities!!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 41)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 42!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 305 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 62!

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 480 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 97!

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - New England / Hazy (Level 23)
items.badge_description: The haze craze is here for days. The third in our series of “Super Style” badges, this one celebrates New England-style / hazy IPAs, which ranked as the 2nd most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.
